verses.name: Ezra 8:1
verses.text: These are now the chief of their fathers, and this is the genealogy of them that went up with me from Babylon, in the reign of Artaxerxes the king.

verses.name: Ezra 8:2
verses.text: Of the sons of Phinehas; Gershom: of the sons of Ithamar; Daniel: of the sons of David; Hattush.

verses.name: Ezra 8:3
verses.text: Of the sons of Shechaniah, of the sons of Pharosh; Zechariah: and with him were reckoned by genealogy of the males an hundred and fifty.

verses.name: Ezra 8:4
verses.text: Of the sons of Pahath–moab; Elihoenai the son of Zerahiah, and with him two hundred males.
